title: NEED A FURNISHED HOME FOR SEVERAL MONTHS?
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   3 Br, 2 bath Townhouse with private fenced patio yard, FULLY FURNISHED AND FULLY EQUIPPED FOR LIVING, LIKE A LONGER TERM VACATION RENTAL including linens, woodburning fireplace and big screen TV in Family room, separate dining room, fully equipped kitchen has separate eating area with view of patio, washer/dryer, AC, WiFi and cable, off street parking, move in ready for the new occupants .Owner may have limited use. Rent will be in a competitive rang e for the area for a comparable house, furnished and equipped for living so you'll need a monthly budget in excess $2200 to qualify. Lease terms can be geared to the occupants' situation. Credit worthiness, and clean background expected. Occupancy can be soon or planning ahead.
